OOC: I don't think anything would be very dramatic in that, as long as 
you state there had been some other loads before.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I was assuming you would if we just skiped to the
> last load.
> 
> BIC:  He gets there and starts loading up.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Why would we get mad?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > OOC: Then let's just say it takes 2 loads so as
> > not to
> > > get the council mad.
> > > 
> > > BIC:  Flicker gets back, loads up under Gatara's
> > > supervision (don't complain, you wanted to speed
> > > things up) and heads back.
> > > 
> > > --- cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Probably 2 or 3 - I don't want to slow
> > things
> > > > down too much, so 
> > > > I'm leaning toward just skipping ahead in time
> > to
> > > > the last load, 
> > > > whatever the number is.
> > > > 
> > > > Again, Gatara trails the Predacon to his ship.
> > > >

> > <dewboy30816@y...>

> > headed
> > > > back
> > > > > for the second.
> > > > > 
> > > > > OOC: How many loads should this take?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > Torin and Gatara assist in the unloading,
> > while
> > > > > > Riekan keeps his hand 
> > > > > > planted firmly on Phoenix's shoulder, his
> > > > harpoon
> > > > > > gun at the ready.
> > > > > >

> > > > expression
> > > > > > of childlike 
> > > > > > wonder crosses her face as she sees the
> > outdoors
> > > > for
> > > > > > what she thinks

> > confused,
